main.name: Orkun Saglam
main.bio: I am a husband to Kallie and father of 2 small dogs -Jemima & Aya-. Immigrated to the US in 2015. A love of problem-solving sparked my interest in software development. Currently, working for a Austin based tech startup, The Guild, specializing in hospitality.
main.contactmessage: Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: Web development is like climbing an endless mountain and these are the items in my backpack so far.

education.degree: Bachelor of Tourism and Hospitality Management

work.title: IT Administrator/Auditor
work.description: Provide guidance and orientation to new hires on how to operate new software and computer equipment, Monitor and maintain computer systems and networks, troubleshooting any issues that arise, Overseeing guest accounts to ensure accuracy of billing

work.title: Night Auditor
work.description: Generated daily financial reports aimed at increasing company profits and reduce costs, Managed and maintained the hotel's reservation systems, Utilized various computer applications to launch and complete the auditing process

projects.title: Gamers Vault
projects.category: A gaming website where users can browse through 500,000+ games and perform CRUD actions.

projects.title: Nice Reads
projects.category: A vanilla JavaScript app with Rails backend API for users to keep track of favorite books and perform CRUD actions on their book collection.

projects.title: Movie Box
projects.category: A Rails app for keeping track of favorite movies and creating lists to manage and organize those movies
